_header: Lift up your hearts and be glad / In Christs birth the angel bade
_description: A New Year song of Good Cheer — four quatrains (aaab) and burden: ‘What cher gud cher gud cher / Be mery & glad this gud new yere’

OxfBal354.First Lines:
Lyft vp your hartis & be gladIn crystis byrth the angell
                    bad…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…& with gud hert he doth to you sayWhat
                    cherExplicit
